subject: Mathematics
question_en: If x + 1/x = 4, then find the value of x^2 + 1/x^2.
question_hi: यदि x + 1/x = 4, तो x^2 + 1/x^2 का मान ज्ञात करें।

subject: Mathematics
question_en: In the given triangle, what is the value of cos A?
question_hi: दी हुई त्रिभुज में, cos A का मान क्या है?
explanation_en: दी गई त्रिभुज का विवरण: AD = 3, BD = 4, CD = 5 \Rightarrow AD^2 = BD^2 + CD^2 \Rightarrow 9 = 16 + 25 \Rightarrow 9 = 41 \Rightarrow AD^2 + BD^2 = CD^2 \Rightarrow cos A = BD/CD = 4/5
explanation_hi: दी गई त्रिभुज का विवरण: AD = 3, BD = 4, CD = 5 \Rightarrow AD^2 = BD^2 + CD^2 \Rightarrow 9 = 16 + 25 \Rightarrow 9 = 41 \Rightarrow AD^2 + BD^2 = CD^2 \Rightarrow cos A = BD/CD = 4/5

subject: Mathematics
question_en: Find the mean of the given data: 2, 4, 6, 8, 10.

subject: Mathematics
question_hi: 60° के लिए sin का मान ज्ञात करें।

subject: Mathematics
question_en: If x - 2y = 0, then find the value of x^2 - y^2.
question_hi: यदि x - 2y = 0, तो x^2 - y^2 का मान ज्ञात करें।
explanation_en: x - 2y = 0 \Rightarrow x = 2y \Rightarrow x^2 - y^2 = (2y)^2 - y^2 = 3y^2 \Rightarrow 3y^2 = 0 (koi bhi value hoga) \Rightarrow 0 = 0
explanation_hi: x - 2y = 0 \Rightarrow x = 2y \Rightarrow x^2 - y^2 = (2y)^2 - y^2 = 3y^2 \Rightarrow 3y^2 = 0 (koi bhi value hoga) \Rightarrow 0 = 0

subject: Mathematics
question_en: In the given triangle, what is the value of sin B?
question_hi: दी गई त्रिभुज में, sin B का मान क्या है?
explanation_en: दी गई त्रिभुज का विवरण: AD = 3, BD = 4, CD = 5 \Rightarrow AD^2 = BD^2 + CD^2 \Rightarrow 9 = 16 + 25 \Rightarrow 9 = 41 \Rightarrow AD^2 + BD^2 = CD^2 \Rightarrow sin B = BD/CD = 4/5
explanation_hi: दी गई त्रिभुज का विवरण: AD = 3, BD = 4, CD = 5 \Rightarrow AD^2 = BD^2 + CD^2 \Rightarrow 9 = 16 + 25 \Rightarrow 9 = 41 \Rightarrow AD^2 + BD^2 = CD^2 \Rightarrow sin B = BD/CD = 4/5
